romantic: Are you a magician? Because whenever I look at you, everyone else disappears.
Do you have a map? I keep getting lost in your eyes.
If I could rearrange the alphabet, I'd put U and I together.
Are you a time traveler? Because I see you in my future.
Do you believe in love at first sight, or should I walk by again?
Is your name Google? Because you have everything I've been searching for.
Are you a camera? Because every time I look at you, I smile.
If beauty were time, you'd be an eternity.
Do you have a Band-Aid? Because I just scraped my knee falling for you.
Can I follow you home? Cause my parents always told me to follow my dreams.
playful: Are you a parking ticket? Because you've got FINE written all over you.
Do you have a sunburn, or are you always this hot?
Are you a WiFi signal? Because I'm feeling a connection.
Is your dad a boxer? Because you're a knockout!
Do you like Star Wars? Because Yoda one for me!
Are you French? Because Eiffel for you.
Do you work at Starbucks? Because I like you a latte.
Are you a 45-degree angle? Because you're acute-y.
Do you have a pencil? Because I want to erase your past and write our future.
Is your name Chapstick? Because you're da balm!
confident: I'm not a photographer, but I can picture us together.
Aside from being gorgeous, what do you do for a living?
I seem to have lost my phone number. Can I have yours?
I'd say God bless you, but it looks like he already did.
Do you have a moment to sign my petition to make our first date a national holiday?
I was blinded by your beauty; I'm going to need your name and number for insurance purposes.
I'm learning about important dates in history. Wanna be one of them?
Are you a bank loan? Because you have my interest.
Your hand looks heavy—can I hold it for you?
I must be a snowflake, because I've fallen for you.
nerdy: Are you made of copper and tellurium? Because you're Cu-Te.
If you were a triangle, you'd be acute one.
Are you a keyboard? Because you're just my type.
You must be the square root of 2, because I feel irrational around you.
Are you a carbon sample? Because I want to date you.
You're like a dictionary—you add meaning to my life.
Are you a compiler? Because you make my code run.
Do you like science? Because I've got my ion you.
Are you a 404 error? Because I've been searching for you everywhere.
You must be a computer keyboard, because you're just my type.

friendly: Hey, I just realized we haven't met yet. I'm fixing that now.
You seem like an interesting person. Mind if I join you?
I couldn't help but notice your smile from across the room.
This might sound random, but you have great taste in [something they're wearing/doing].
I'm usually shy, but I felt like I had to come say hi.
I promised myself I'd talk to the most interesting-looking person here. That's you.
Quick question: what's your opinion on [current topic]?
You look like you'd give great book/movie recommendations.
I was about to leave, but then I saw you and thought I should introduce myself.
Your energy is amazing. I had to come over and meet you.
funny: Are you a beaver? Because daaaaam!
Did you just come out of the oven? Because you're hot!
Are you a banana? Because I find you a-peeling.
Do you believe in fate? Because I think we've just met by mistake... wait, I meant 'mate'!
Are you a volcano? Because I lava you!
If you were a vegetable, you'd be a cute-cumber.
Are you a cat? Because you're purr-fect.
I'm no mathematician, but I'm pretty good with numbers. How about you give me yours?
Do you play soccer? Because you're a keeper!
Are you Australian? Because you meet all of my koala-fications.
sweet: I think there's something wrong with my eyes. I can't take them off you.
You know what's beautiful? Read the first word again.
I'm not trying to impress you or anything, but... I'm Batman!
Excuse me, but I think you dropped something: MY JAW!
Life without you would be like a broken pencil... pointless.
If looks could kill, you'd be a weapon of mass destruction.
You're so beautiful that you made me forget my pickup line.
I would never play hide and seek with you because someone like you is impossible to find.
Can you take me to the doctor? Because I just broke my leg falling for you.
There's only one thing I want to change about you, and that's your last name.
clever: I'm writing a term paper on the finer things in life, and I was wondering if I could interview you.
I'd like to take you to the movies, but they don't let you bring in your own snacks.
Do you have any raisins? No? How about a date?
I'm not a hoarder but I really want to keep you forever.
Are you my appendix? Because I don't understand how you work but this feeling in my stomach makes me want to take you out.
I'm no organ donor but I'd be happy to give you my heart.
I ought to complain to Spotify for you not being named this week's hottest single.
Are you a loan? Because you've got my interest.
I'm not usually religious, but when I saw you, I knew you were the answer to my prayers.
On a scale of 1 to 10, you're a 9 and I'm the 1 you need.

romantic: The only thing your eyes haven't told me is your name.
I don't need Twitter—I'm already following you.
Roses are red, violets are blue, how did I get so lucky to match with you?
I'm not usually into online dating, but I'd make an exception for you.
You're like my favorite song—I could listen to you all day long.
I think the gap between my fingers were meant for yours.
Your lips look lonely. Would they like to meet mine?
Kiss me if I'm wrong, but dinosaurs still exist, right?
I don't know which is prettier today—the weather, or your eyes.
I was feeling off today, but you definitely turned me on.
confident: Let's play a game. Winner takes the loser out to dinner.
I know this is forward, but you seem like someone I should get to know.
I usually don't approach people like this, but there's something about you.
I have a feeling we're going to have an amazing conversation.
I don't normally do this, but I'd regret it if I didn't come talk to you.
Something tells me you're the type of person who makes everything more fun.
I have a sixth sense, and it's telling me we should grab coffee sometime.
I'm going to be honest—I came over here because you're stunning.
Let me guess: you're used to people being speechless around you?
I have a really good feeling about us. Coffee to test my intuition?

sweet: I'm not great at small talk, but I'd love to have a big conversation with you.
You have the kind of smile that could brighten anyone's day.
I don't know you yet, but I have a feeling you're pretty amazing.
I'm usually not this bold, but I wanted to meet the person behind that wonderful smile.
You seem like the type of person who makes the world a better place.
I know we just met, but I already think you're pretty special.
Something about you tells me you have great stories to tell.
I believe in good vibes, and you're radiating them.
Meeting you feels like finding a four-leaf clover.
You look like someone who makes every day an adventure.
genuine: Hi, I'm [Shubham]. I noticed you and wanted to introduce myself properly.
I love your [specific compliment about something genuine]. It really caught my attention.
You have really positive energy. I'd love to get to know you better.
I appreciate people who [observed quality], and you seem to embody that.
Something about the way you [specific action] made me want to come say hello.
I'm drawn to genuine people, and you seem like one of them.
You seem interesting, and I'd regret not introducing myself.
I wanted to meet you because you seem like someone worth knowing.
I value meaningful connections, and I have a feeling we could have one.
You caught my attention, and I wanted to see if we click.
